verses.name: Jeremiah 48:40
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord; Behold, he shall fly as an eagle, and shall spread his wings over Moab.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:41
verses.text: Kerioth is taken, and the strong holds are surprised, and the mighty men’s hearts in Moab at that day shall be as the heart of a woman in her pangs.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:42
verses.text: And Moab shall be destroyed from being a people, because he hath magnified himself against the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:43
verses.text: Fear, and the pit, and the snare, shall be upon thee, O inhabitant of Moab, saith the Lord.
